title: Ticket #1085: Compile without Backfill
description:
http://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/wiki?p=HowToConfigureBackfill

Fetch work is shown to be an alternative to Backfill.

We should start compiling without Backfill.
remarks:
2010-Feb-15 14:00:30 by matt:
Waiting on DanB to deploy/prove the fetch hook alternative.

2010-Apr-27 20:27:58 by matt:
Dan, any update on this?

2010-Jul-27 16:38:47 by danb:
fetch-work backfill has been running successfully on GLOW and CHTC for some time now. I contacted Clemson and LIGO and suggested that they try out the fetch-work recipe.

Remaining item that needs to be addressed before we can remove the old backfill support in the code:

  • distribute sample scripts and configuration for doing boinc backfill. What about windows? Is it acceptable to distribute a unix shell script and expect windows people to deal with it?
2010-Oct-20 16:03:30 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.

Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
